name: Nikki
description: Nikki and his kind master, Andre Dupas, are traveling via canoe through the Canadian Rockies. When Nikki encounters Neewa, a bear cub that's lost its mother, Andre ties the two animals together, plops them in the canoe, and heads for the rapids. When the two animals become separated from Andre, the unlikely pair must learn to survive in the wilderness. What is initially a relationship of hate and incompatibility transforms into one of compromise and friendship between species. Encounters with...

name: Gunther Magnuson
description: Gunther is Kick's best friend, stunt coordinator, and his wingman. He is overweight (relatively) and has a tendency to worry. Unlike Kick, Gunther does not willingly perform massive stunts alone, but will if the case requires. He also appears to have attention problems in crucial situations. His worst fear (that we have seen) is to be separated from Kick. Although Gunther said that his family is from Norway, he wears Dutch clogs, the flag of Sweden is hanging in his room, and he wears Lederho...

name: Doctor Frankenollie
description: Frankenollie puts an ad in the newspaper promising to pay his employer $999 and 99 cents. Mickey answers the ad and heads over to the address. Mickey is sucked into an underground laboratory and captured. Frankenollie then informs Mickey of his sadistic plan; to switch his brain with that of his monster Julius. During the brain switch, he attaches helmets to their heads and activates a switch while laughing manically causing a large explosion. Mickey awakes to find himself in Julius' body and...

name: Quint

He is exceptionally manipulative and sly, and likes to trick others into doing his bidding. He will go so far as to pretend that he is someone's friend, only to betray them and steal from them, as shown in "Klondike Con", where Quint begins as a courteous man helping Timon and Pumbaa, with Timon not gaining his trust, helping them get gold. name: Diazo
description: Diazo is a laid back teenage boy who speaks softly, but shows some slight confidence. He is especially kind towards Ethan who has a crush on him and it is implied that Diazo is well aware. He likes to tease him and is shown to have a playful attitude. He is also understanding as he was well aware that Searcher was embarrassing Ethan, but did not hold that against him. Diazo is an all around nice person who cares about his friends.
